name: Bewitched Cat
description:
Meow!

Little witch Juniper and her familiar cat Ira moved to another forest but she forgot all the ingredients for her potions! Now it's up to Ira to collect these in the surrounding magical forest but beware of the creatures there.

Controls

Installation

1. Download ZIP folder

2. Save the ZIP folder in a safe space

3. Right click and select "extract here"

4. Start the .exe file

Credits

A creation by Patricia Michel for htk academy

Sounds and Music are from WeLoveIndies.

The game was made in Unity and Aseprite.
